com.camerontec.catalys.server.rules.util

Class RulesEngineMessageStorePerSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.rules.util.RulesEngineMessageStorePerSession

  • public class RulesEngineMessageStorePerSession
extends Object
    SessionStoredMessages is a singleton class that provides access to the message store for each session. This is useful in routing where we need to check the store of the originating session when we're deciding whether to route a message back to it.
